actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit to individuals for maintaining a household for older dependents.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable income tax credit for household expenses to any taxpayer who maintains a household in which a dependent aged 65 or over resides. Limits such credit to $500 for each aged dependent for the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit to individuals for maintaining a household for older dependents.
